description: Number of binary words not containing ..01110...
references: R. Austin and R. K. Guy, Binary sequences without isolated ones, Fib. Quart., 16 (1978), 84-86.
V. C. Harris, C. C. Styles, A generalization of Fibonacci numbers, Fib. Quart. 2 (1964) 277-289, sequence u(n,3,2).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Russ Chamberlain, Sam Ginsburg and Chi Zhang, Generating Functions and Wilf-equivalence on Theta_k-embeddings, University of Wisconsin, April 2012.
Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 425
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1,0,0,1).
formula: G.f. : (1-x+x^4)/(1-2x+x^2-x^5). _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.a(n-1)=sum{k=0..floor(n/5), binomial(n-3k, 2k)}. - _Paul Barry_, Sep 16 2004
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
